snippet.title: Heir of the Dog - Teaser 2023
snippet.description:
From the creators of Lucy Dreaming comes Heir of the Dog, a hilariously British pixel-art point & click adventure set in dark, Victorian London.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2431920/Heir_of_the_Dog/
Website: https://heirofthedog.co.uk/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tallstorygames
